body.name: Lingito Travel Toothbrush, On The Go Folding Feature, Medium Bristle Brushes (3 Pack Medium-Multicolor)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35. Order within 4 hrs 12 mins
features: Foldable Design: The toothbrush folds into a compact size for easy storage and travel.
Ergonomic Handle: The toothbrush has a comfortable grip and soft bristles for a gentle clean.
Multi-Use: The toothbrush can be used for brushing teeth, cleaning between teeth, and even massaging sore gums.
Reusable and Eco-Friendly: The toothbrush is made from durable plastic and can be used for years with proper care.
Complete Oral Care: The toothbrush comes with 3 medium bristle brushes for a thorough clean.

productInformation.name: Best Sellers Rank
productInformation.value: #4,163 in Health & Household (See Top 100 in Health & Household) #26 in Manual Toothbrushes

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: What's Included? Travel Toothbrush (3 Pack) made with an on the go folding feature & medium bristles. Features: Take your toothbrush with you on the go with our convenient folding feature to keep your toothbrush clean and away from bacteria!Medium bristles with an ergonomic handle make it enjoyable to brush your teeth and it helps prevent any damage being done to your enamel or gums.3 Pack of Toothbrushes so everyone in the family has one to use for traveling or whenever out and about.

TRAVEL DESIGN You will receive 3 firm toothbrushes easily fits your pocket, purse, office desk drawer, travel toothbrush kit, and toiletries bag. Our medium bristle toothbrush has a slender design that is supple, which can pierce the deepest part of your teeth fight tartar, plaque and other particles. These manual toothbrushes can clean your teeth deeply without damaging or hurting your sensitive gums. DENTIST RECOMMENDED This foldable toothbrush has been clinically recommended for its effective cleaning, plaque removal, and gentle gum protection Prevent cavities, strengthen your gums and promote a healthy brushing routine for your everyone in the family. These toothbrushes medium bristles are also packed that can be easily brought as a travel toothbrush or camping toothbrush. EASILY FOLDABLE Regular-sized brush that instantly folds into travel-size toothbrush in one-flip action. Must-have in your travel toothbrush case. Our manual toothbrushes are designed to be used multiple times, even up to months! Medium bristles are flexible enough to fight and reach particles and other substances in your teeth.

Manual Toothbrush Healthy Benefits: • Using a medium bristled toothbrush will fight plaques and harmful particles from your mouth which makes it healthy. A clean and healthy mouth will prevent the germsfrom entering your lungs, hence, protecting you from getting different respiratory illness as well. • Medium bristle toothbrushes are recommended by dentists because they are gentle on teeth and gums while effectively fighting particles and plaque. This is a toothbrush soft bristle that is useful for both your kids and you adults and is able to brush your teeth and gums without irritation. Hard bristle toothbrushes can irritate gums and cause bleeding. • Medium bristled toothbrushes will not be too hard on your teeth's enamels. Hard bristled toothbrushes will wear away your enamels which will make it weaker and eventually cause you a great amount of pain. Harder bristles will also put an additional force on your teeth, nicking away at the integrity. Toothpaste already contains chemicals that is rough on the teeth, so don’t make it worse by using a hard bristled toothbrush into the mix.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 26, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Great travel size brushes. Sturdy. Very well made. I recommend this product. 👌

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 19, 2023
reviews.reviewText: These toothbrushes are small, lightweight and seem to be easy to keep clean. Sometimes the bristles get hard on travel toothbrushes after you use them, but not this toothbrush. They started off soft remained soft. I purchased them twice.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good for what I needed but flimsy
reviews.reviewText: The brushes are just normal cheap toothbrushes. I use them for traveling since they’re small and fold but they do fold while using and it’s slightly annoying.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 16, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I travel a lot and I have been buying these for a while -usually in stores when I can find them. Good quality. Doesn’t break. Good brush. Great for travel and at home.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 21, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for travel and emergency replacement
reviews.reviewText: I used this toothbrush to travel with. It is easy to pack and I don't have to worry about looking for a place to stand it when there is no tooth brush stand at the hotel/Airbnb. I simply fold it and its done. I was able to share one with my partner since it comes in a pack of 3. It also served me as an emergency replacement when my toothbrush fell into the toilet.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars I put these everywhere - in my car, at work and in my travel bag!
reviews.reviewText: I like having these folding toothbrushes when I need them. They are convenient and I like that the brush is covered when folded to keep it clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Great idea but not great to use
reviews.reviewText: I like that these are compact and are ventilated enough to dry. I use it whenever I’m out to eat or at the office to brush my braces. However, they keep folding closed during use. That makes brushing a hassle.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars GREAT price and love the folding toothbrush
reviews.reviewText: Great value and love the space saver by folding

reviews.reviewTitle: Arrived in a timely matter, nice purse size toothbrushes

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on July 30, 2023
reviews.reviewText: not used yet but seem to be ok
J'ai galeŕré pour trouver une brosse medium de voyage, je ne trouvais que des souples.Seul bemol, aucun cran pour bloquer l ouverture du coup elle a tendance à se refermerDommage

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality toothbrush that also folds in half
reviews.reviewText: I travel a fair bit and try to keep everything small and limited as possible. This is the first time I've had a toothbrush with a quality head and can now fold in half to save space in my toiletry bag! Best ever!
The product arrived very quickly and was as advertised. It has not been used yet.
